tldr: Affected versions of `django-allauth` are vulnerable to cross-site request forgery (CSRF) and open redirect. Both IdP-initiated and SP-initiated SSO flows were susceptible to this attack. The IdP-initiated SSO flow is now disabled by default in the patched version.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a vulnerable version of the package.
vulnerable_to: Cross-Site Request Forgery and Open Redirect
